name: SmashMania
description:
NOTE: you need an Oculus Quest to play this game!

A beautiful and fast paced rhythm game with support for all levels of difficulty all the way from noob to pro. The simulation file format used is compatible with StepMania (PC) which makes this game automatically support tens of thousands of songs available for download online.

The full version comes with 25 songs and the ability to play any compatible songs found online.
